attributes.action: Pay Rises for key service workers in line with MPs
attributes.additional_details:
It is unjust and an abuse of authority and power to allow you and your colleagues to gain a high pay rise, whilst offering a meagre pay rise to the people that need it.
MPs will be returning to work with an 11% increase to pay, which is incredible when key service personnel i.e. Armed forces, Nurses, Policemen are only given 1%

The proposal is simple, increase in pay for MPs must reflect the increase in pay for key service workers, thus MPs can no longer give themselves a high percentage pay rise without giving the same to the key service workers.
